summary: This is a brief email header from August 10, 2019, sent to a Communication Technician at the US Department of Justice's Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It appears to be a communication regarding the facility, but the body content is not provided, limiting detailed analysis.
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, sent to a Communication Technician at the MCC-New York.
The MCC-New York is a federal detention center where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.
The email date is significant as it falls within the period between Epstein's arrest (July 2019) and his death (August 10, 2019).
